title: Colnago C68 Fleur-de-Lys Celebrates the First Italian Grand Depart in the History of the Tour
content:
An immaculately conceived Colnago C68? The Fleur-de-Lys edition celebrates the upcoming Grand DÃ©part in Florence, with 111 numbered examples, priced at 23,000 EUR, for the 111th edition of the Tour de France.

Read the full article at Colnago C68 Fleur-de-Lys Celebrates the First Italian Grand Depart in the History of the Tour on Velo.
author: Jessie-May Morgan
